ResearchProjectDef.label: entity anatomy table
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks build a research bench for dissecting entity corpses to gain Anomaly research points. Yields no leather, meat, or filth.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Entity Autopsy
subject_story-> Performed systematic biological dissection on a non-carbon-based extraterrestrial lifeform
subject_story-> Worked at a clandestine research institute dedicated to classifying unknown biological entities
subject_story-> Discovered and documented numerous abnormal organ functions from Void creatures
subject_story-> Caused partial reassembly of a dissected entity specimen on the operating table due to operational error, triggering a containment breach
subject_gerund-> Dissecting entities to study their biological characteristics

ResearchProjectDef.label: flesh sealing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform a psychic ritual that seal the fleshmass nucleus within a specialized vessel that automatically purges newly formed warped flesh and converts it into stored chemfuel. Compatible with grav ship fuel systems.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Flesh Preservation
subject_story-> Developed technology to preserve biological tissue permanently in stasis fields
subject_story-> Managed a gene bank storing rare alien biological specimens
subject_story-> Accidentally activated a preserved predator embryo causing severe consequences
subject_gerund-> Containing living flesh in stasis capsules

ResearchProjectDef.label: distorted terraformer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks build a Biometal-powered Terraformer that generates breathable safe zones in space and significantly raises the region's minimum temperature.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Supernatural Terraforming
subject_story-> Led eco-dome construction on a planet enveloped by lethal atmosphere
subject_story-> Researched using native microbiota to rapidly purify toxic environments
subject_story-> Accidentally turned a desert into a permanent fluorescent swamp due to failed weather control experiment
subject_gerund-> Reshaping local climate by channeling telluric energies

ResearchProjectDef.label: void field extender
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks build a field extender that uses shaders to replace the gravcore.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Void Field Extender
subject_story-> Participated in experimental projects using Void energy to stabilize local spacetime structures
subject_story-> Maintained a remote matter transmission array based on grav engine principles
subject_story-> Researched methods to expand internal volume of enclosed spaces through gravitational field distortion
subject_story-> Briefly "stretched" a forest area into another dimension during prototype testing
subject_gerund-> Calibrating field effect parameters of Void Field Extenders
subject_gerund-> Deploying Void Field Extenders to increase grav ship payload capacity

ResearchProjectDef.label: void thruster
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct a Dark Arcane-powered spacecraft thruster that significantly reduces fuel consumption.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Void Thruster
subject_story-> Tested experimental engines generating thrust by tearing spacetime
subject_story-> Reverse-engineered FTL technology from crashed alien spacecraft wreckage
subject_story-> Briefly stranded a ship and its crew in timeless Void during jump test
subject_gerund-> Installing Void Thrusters on grav ships

ResearchProjectDef.label: gold canary
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using a Golden Cube, create an invulnerable legendary creature that provides a mood boost to the entire area.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Immortal Gold Canary
subject_story-> Researched legendary golden mechanical lifeforms capable of rebirth from flames
subject_story-> Restored an eternal guardian device left by ancient civilization
subject_story-> Witnessed Gold Canary healing radiation wounds across entire area with its glow
subject_gerund-> Seeking eternal blessings from the Gold Canary

ResearchProjectDef.label: ship cooldown
ResearchProjectDef.description: Performs a psychic ritual that rapidly cools the grav ship's engine and increases the maximum range of its next voyage

rulesStrings.li: subject->Gravship Cooling Ritual
subject_story-> Studied ancient chanting methods said to channel heat into the Void through sonic waves
subject_story-> Discovered ritual patterns for "cooling" metals in a lost manuscript
subject_story-> Witnessed an old technician calm an overheating engine through chants and complex gestures
subject_story-> A ritual failure caused a ship engine to become permanently locked due to over-cooling
subject_gerund-> Presiding over starship cooling rituals
subject_gerund-> Chilling critical components by chanting cooling hymns

ResearchProjectDef.label: reveal information
ResearchProjectDef.description: Performs a psychic ritual to extract valuable information from the Void, revealing a quest location

rulesStrings.li: subject->Void Message
subject_story-> Deciphered non-Euclidean geometric signals from deep Void
subject_story-> Served as communications officer monitoring deep space anomalous radiation signals
subject_story-> Received warning message from future self but couldn't fully comprehend it
subject_gerund-> Decrypting encoded messages from the Void

ResearchProjectDef.label: dark infusion
ResearchProjectDef.description: Performs a psychic ritual that envelops all allied units within the shader's reach with void-walking capability, allowing safe operation in space for a brief period.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Vacuum Survival Ritual
subject_story-> Mastered an esoteric technique to drastically reduce oxygen need through deep meditation
subject_story-> Joined an extreme cult that screened followers through vacuum chamber rituals
subject_story-> Completed a ten-minute survival ritual in space vacuum without any protection
subject_story-> Bears ancient tattoos said to form an invisible protective layer in vacuum
subject_gerund-> Performing vacuum survival rituals
subject_gerund-> Inscribing vacuum-protection runes on spacesuits

ResearchProjectDef.label: twisted reconstruction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Performs a psychic ritual that warps and mends the target's equipment using Void energy.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Gear Refabrication
subject_story-> Operated device capable of decomposing and reassembling molecular structures
subject_story-> Successfully refabricated scrap metal into functional power armor
subject_story-> Fused a weapon with user's arm during refabrication experiment
subject_gerund-> Refabricating useless equipment into useful tools

ResearchProjectDef.label: parallel dimension
ResearchProjectDef.description: Performs a psychic ritual that transports the entire region to a similar yet distinct world, repairing grav ship wrecks and resetting nearby landmarks.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Parallel Spacetime
subject_story-> Researched methods to briefly open rifts to resource-rich parallel dimensions
subject_story-> Briefly communicated with alternate-timeline self
subject_story-> Caused partial overlap of two similar but hostile timelines due to experiment accident
subject_gerund-> Scouting parallel timelines for rare resources
